cause.description:
Lebanon is a small beautiful country on the Mediterranean. It is one of the most beautiful touristic places... BUT So many outside political forces led to wars, destruction and drowning..
SO PLEASE! LEAVE LEBANON ALONE!!!!!
1. Lebanon's outside intervention must end now
2. Lebanon is and should stay a free country
3. Lebanese people deserve to live in peace
4. LEAVE LEBANON ALONE!!!
cause.mission: Free LEBANON from any outside intervention...
cause.name: Leave LEBANON alone!!!
